title: Pilpel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Fast food, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Middle Eastern
description: Chain of vegetarian falafel bars with all food being vegan apart from hard-boiled egg and feta cheese extra toppings options. Dine in or take-out with online ordering available. Made-in-house to order falafel in a pita or bowl and a huge range of salads. While waiting for order, offers samples.
